Launch VectrixDB Dashboard

Source: R/zzzz_dashboard_exact.R
vdb_dashboard.Rd

Start the VectrixDB API server and mount the HTML dashboard at /dashboard.

Usage

vdb_dashboard(
  db = NULL,
  data_path = "./vectrixdb_data",
  port = 7377,
  host = "127.0.0.1",
  launch.browser = TRUE,
  api_key = NULL
)

Arguments

db

Optional Vectrix object.

data_path

Path to vector database directory.

port

Port number (default: 7377).

host

Host address (default: "127.0.0.1").

launch.browser

Whether to open browser on start.

api_key

Optional API key for authenticated write operations.

Value

Invisibly returns server object from vectrix_serve().
